Yahoo Finance Stock Portfolio Dashboard
data.description: A stock dashboard style for Yahoo Finance homepage. It displays all of your stock portfolios on one screen in a grid style, and displays their prices and changes lively. It also hides other unimportant elements like ads, promotions, disclaimer, etc. Use as a replacement for Google Finance portfolio. Need yahoo account. Applies to https://finance.yahoo.com/

data.name: qemu.weilnetz.de black
All About article width adjuster
data.description:
All Aboutの固定幅となっている記事を調整できるようにします。
This script enables the article of All About(allabout.co.jp) whose width is fixed to be adjustable accordingly to the browser width.

data.name: SerialZone Dark
data.description:
Tmavá verze SerialZone 3.0, je to zatím beta verze, celkem narychlo obarvená.
Používám tmavě modrou barvu pozadí, která se dá změnit v profilu (nejspíš jen při zakoupené změně pozadí)
